mil.nga.giat.geowave.store.adapter

Interface DataAdapter<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type for the data elements that are being adapted
    All Superinterfaces:
    DataReader<Object>, Persistable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AttachedIteratorDataAdapter<T>, HadoopDataAdapter<T,W>, IndexDependentDataAdapter<T>, ModelConvertingDataAdapter<T>, StatisticalDataAdapter<T>, WritableDataAdapter<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataAdapter, FeatureCollectionDataAdapter, FeatureDataAdapter, RasterDataAdapter

    public interface DataAdapter<T>
extends DataReader<Object>, Persistable
    This interface should be implemented by any custom data type that must be stored in the Accumulo index. It enables storing and retrieving the data, as well as translating the data into values and queries that can be used to index. Additionally, each entry is responsible for providing visibility if applicable.
